definition: a test of the suitability of a performer, to perform in order to get a role
details:
noun
- a test of the suitability of a performer
= synonyms: tryout
- the ability to hear
= synonyms: hearing, auditory sense, sense of hearing, auditory modality
verb
- to perform in order to get a role
= example: to perform in order to get a role
= synonyms: try out
